name: Shackle the Unworthy
description:
Admonish your target for their past transgressions, reducing the damage they deal to you by 8% and dealing 1,229 Arcane damage over 14 sec.

While Shackle the Unworthy is active on an enemy, your direct-damage attacks that spend runes have a 100% chance to spread Shackle the Unworthy to a nearby enemy.
